hint.text: Observe that the graph is a straight line which rises proportionally.

solution.text:
Draw a horizontal line from _{j}_kms on the y-axis towards the right until it intersects the graph.
From this point draw a vertical line downwards until it intersects the x-axis.
This value gives the time taken by vettel to travel _{j}_ kms.
For example: Look at the graph shown below.
The graph shows that Vettel takes 0.5 hrs to travel 160 kms

content.text: The time taken by Vettel to travel _{j}_kms?
